workspace
you define

Studio is a differentiated, global workspace where your company can thrive.

elevated
co‑working

We understand the importance of agility, and the need for companies of all sizes to be able to move quickly and to scale as needed — when needed. We know that the right space increases productivity, optimizes innovation, and promotes wellbeing, allowing companies to focus on what they do best. To meet the needs of an evolving workplace, we are pleased to offer a new type of workspace.

Fit for you

From open seating to private suites, to conference rooms, and to short-term and conventional leasing, we provide a full spectrum of outstanding workspace solutions to meet your needs.

Flex desks: $450
2 to 30 desks: $1,700 – $22,500
Dedicated spaces up to full floors also available with Studio Private. Please contact our team for additional information and discounts.

Higher standards

We offer private offices from one person up to the size you need. Locations feature premium acoustics, secure private networks, diverse meeting spaces, and varied common areas, all ready as part of instant plug-and-play solutions.

Global access

With our international network of properties, Studio gives you the ability to have a truly global footprint. Every property boasts the same exceptional level of services and amenities while having a unique environment based on location.

Like-minded community

Be part of a community of industry leaders and banner corporations with access to events and programming customized to your needs.

Exceptional services

Studio’s holistic approach to services allows you to focus on what you do best. Standard services include complete IT solutions, concierge service, daily cleaning, mail and package handling — and ZO.℠

What is ZO.℠?

Discover on-site and on-demand services that bring work and life together like never before. You get access to everything from food and fitness to education and transportation all at the tap of an app.

For companies that require a dedicated space, Studio Private offers move-in ready, customizable private suites and full floors, furnished or unfurnished — with the flexibility of short-term leasing. All-inclusive services to be tailored based on your needs could include: IT, on-site staff, community and event management, F&B options, cleaning, and access to other global Studio locations.

inquire

Rockefeller
Center, NYC

Find your workspace at an historic landmark. With more than 100 retail shops and restaurants, seven major New York City attractions and nine subway stations nearby, Rockefeller Center is a hub for shopping, dining and culture.

Beverly
Hills, LA

Fall in love with this regal workspace in the heart of Beverly Hills. Renovated in 2017, the Studio property mixes old-world glamour with contemporary design — featuring stunning elements like an expansive central courtyard and dramatic atrium sky bridge. Minutes away from the Golden Triangle, Studio’s exclusive address gives you access to Rodeo Drive, which features some of the nation’s premier dining and shopping options, along with a vibrant scene of food trucks and pop-up restaurants.

125 High St, Boston

Located in the center of Boston’s bustling Financial District, Studio is steps away from the vibrant Post Office Square and historic Seaport District. You are surrounded by a boundless supply of food, drink, and entertainment — ranging from local pubs and food trucks to upscale art galleries and world-famous museums. Studio is conveniently located, with South and T train stations nearby, the commuter ferry dock in close proximity, and major interstates all providing quick access to the broader Boston area.

900 19th Street,
